messages.title: WORKING FOR CHANGE IN EREWASH
messages.content: Jessica sees the terrible consequences of having terrible Tory bosses for the state we are in, and she shares your frustration. Living locally, she is always the one we can trust to continue fighting for us with all her might.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to reopen Ormiston station are already partially funded. Years of Tory and Labour inaction have left local hopes and plans stranded. We do not care who closed it or who failed to reopen it â€“ we just want to get things done.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jessica works as a child protection lawyer and is having the same terrible consequences we are living with this.

images.caption: Jessica taking action in the local area.
